name: Ace Maverick (itch)
description:
v0.0.9 - WASD/Arrow Keys to Move | Space to Shoot

Falkor the Dragon has obtained an Ancient Fire Shield. This has given him an Ancient Power, making him Impossible to slay. Unless you FIGHT FIRE with FIRE. Collect as many Fire Shields as you can find. Only with your help, will Falkor be slain.
